feature.label: MSP430 DriverLib (Target Content)
feature.description:
MSP430 DriverLib (Target Content)
MSP430 DriverLib Target Content provides low-level peripheral driver support in the form of re-buildable C source code libraries.
Different versions of DriverLib Target Content can be chosen on a per-project basis via their project settings. The DriverLib IDE Client, on the other hand, is common to all projects and its installed version is always greater than or equal to the version of this Target Content feature.
